articles.title: Neurologists reveal the top 3 foods to avoid to protect your brain and nervous system - AOL.com
articles.description: Neurologists identify common foods that can contain dangerous neurotoxins and tapeworms that could harm brain health — and provide tips on what to watch for.
articles.content: Doctors recommend foods like berries, nuts, fish packed with omega-3 fatty acids and even dark chocolate for neurological health. They also discourage foods high in sugar and saturated fat, which can… [+4288 chars]
